name: tposeqd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(ctpos(c0), ctpos(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(ctpos(c0), ctpos(c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → tpos(c0)= tpos(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c0 = c1)
⊣ (c0 = c1 → tpos(c0)= tpos(c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(ctpos(c0), ctpos(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(ctpos(c0), ctpos(c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → tpos(c0)= tpos(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c0 = c1)
⊣ (c0 = c1 → tpos(c0)= tpos(c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(ctpos(c0), ctpos(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))

comment: Equality theorem for transposition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2017.)
